text:
請備齊相關資料再次進入系統，完成線上補正/補件作業，本署將儘速為您辦理後續審查作業。
可透過本系統<申請進度查詢>功能查找申請案件並進行退補案件處理作業。
退補正/件收件號：[redacted_number]退補正/件團號：[redacted_number]
您可以登入境外人士線上申辦系統-旅居海外大陸地區人民申請來臺觀光入境許可查詢您的申請資料以及處理進度。
trans:
Please prepare the relevant documents and re-enter the system to complete the online supplement/correction process. We will proceed with the subsequent review as soon as possible.
You can use the “Application Progress Inquiry” function in this system to locate your application and manage the return/correction process.
Return/Correction Receipt Number: [redacted_number]Return/Correction Group Number: [redacted_number]
You may log in to the Online Application System for Overseas Applicants—Overseas and Mainland Chinese Residents Applying for a Taiwan Entry Permit for Tourism to check your application details and processing status.
